newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - General Mills EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - General Mills EPS view cut.

text.p: Donaldson, Lufkin and Jenrette analyst William Leach said Friday he reduced his earnings estimate for cereal and food company General Mills Inc to $3.15 a share from $3.20 for fiscal 1998.
-- He also cut his estimate for fiscal 1999 to $3.40 a share from $3.45. General Mills earned $3.00 a share before an accounting charge in fiscal 1997.
-- On Thursday, General Mills reported earnings for the fourth quarter of fiscal 1997 of $0.42 a share, down from $0.49 a year ago, which Leach said was in line with his estimate.
-- The fourth quarter results, however, included a $0.05 a share LIFO inventory credit.
-- General Mills shares were up 1/2 at 65-1/2.
